channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: The "KFF Health News Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from our newsroom to the airwaves each week.

item.title: Por qué los huesos frágiles no es solo un problema de las mujeres

item.title: Why Brittle Bones Aren’t Just a Woman’s Problem
item.description: More men are now living long enough to develop osteoporosis. But few are aware of the risk, and fewer still are screened and treated.

item.title: Kids who use social media score lower on reading and memory tests, a study shows
item.description: Data from a large, ongoing study of adolescents shows a link between increasing social media use and lower cognition and memory in teens.
